verses.text: \w After|strong="G3326"\w* \w this|strong="G5023"\w* I \w looked|strong="G1492"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w door|strong="G2374"\w* \add was\add* \w opened|strong="G0455"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w voice|strong="G5456"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* I \w heard|strong="G0191"\w* \add was\add* as it \w were|strong="G5613"\w* of a \w trumpet|strong="G4536"\w* \w talking|strong="G2980"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w me|strong="G1700"\w*; which \w said|strong="G3004"\w*, Come \w up|strong="G0305"\w* \w hither|strong="G5602"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* I will \w shew|strong="G1166"\w* \w thee|strong="G4671"\w* \w things|strong="G5023"\w* \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w must|strong="G1163"\w* \w be|strong="G1096"\w* \w hereafter|strong="G3326"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w immediately|strong="G2112"\w* I \w was|strong="G1096"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w*, \w behold|strong="G2400"\w*, a \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* was \w set|strong="G2749"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w heaven|strong="G3772"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add one\add* \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w he|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w* to look \w upon|strong="G3706"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* a \w jasper|strong="G2393"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* a \w sardine|strong="G4555"\w* \w stone|strong="G3037"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add there was\add* a \w rainbow|strong="G2463"\w* round \w about|strong="G2943"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, in \w sight|strong="G3706"\w* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* an \w emerald|strong="G4664"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* round \w about|strong="G2943"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \add were\add* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w seats|strong="G2362"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* the \w seats|strong="G2362"\w* I \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* \w sitting|strong="G2521"\w*, \w clothed|strong="G4016"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w white|strong="G3022"\w* \w raiment|strong="G2440"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w heads|strong="G2776"\w* \w crowns|strong="G4735"\w* of \w gold|strong="G5552"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* out \w of|strong="G1537"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \w proceeded|strong="G1607"\w* \w lightnings|strong="G0796"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thunderings|strong="G1027"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w voices|strong="G5456"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add there were\add* \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w lamps|strong="G2985"\w* of \w fire|strong="G4442"\w* \w burning|strong="G2545"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w which|strong="G3739"\w* \w are|strong="G1526"\w* the \w seven|strong="G2033"\w* \w Spirits|strong="G4151"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w* \add there was\add* a \w sea|strong="G2281"\w* of \w glass|strong="G5193"\w* like \w unto|strong="G3664"\w* \w crystal|strong="G2930"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w midst|strong="G3319"\w* of the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* round \w about|strong="G2945"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \add were\add* \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* full \w of|strong="G1073"\w* \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w before|strong="G1715"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w behind|strong="G3693"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w beast|strong="G2226"\w* \add was\add* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* a \w lion|strong="G3023"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w second|strong="G1208"\w* \w beast|strong="G2226"\w* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* a \w calf|strong="G3448"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w third|strong="G5154"\w* \w beast|strong="G2226"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* a \w face|strong="G4383"\w* \w as|strong="G5613"\w* a \w man|strong="G0444"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w fourth|strong="G5067"\w* \w beast|strong="G2226"\w* \add was\add* \w like|strong="G3664"\w* a \w flying|strong="G4072"\w* \w eagle|strong="G0105"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* the \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w had|strong="G2192"\w* \w each|strong="G0303"\w* of \w them|strong="G1438"\w* \w six|strong="G1803"\w* \w wings|strong="G4420"\w* \w about|strong="G2943"\w* \add him\add*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add they were\add* \w full|strong="G1073"\w* of \w eyes|strong="G3788"\w* \w within|strong="G2081"\w*: \w and|strong="G2532"\w* they \w rest|strong="G0372"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w night|strong="G3571"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*, \w Holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w holy|strong="G0040"\w*, \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w Almighty|strong="G3841"\w*, \w which|strong="G3588"\w* \w was|strong="G2258"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w is|strong="G5607"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* is to \w come|strong="G2064"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w when|strong="G3752"\w* \w those|strong="G3588"\w* \w beasts|strong="G2226"\w* \w give|strong="G1325"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w thanks|strong="G2169"\w* to \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*,

The \w four|strong="G5064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w twenty|strong="G1501"\w* \w elders|strong="G4245"\w* fall \w down|strong="G4098"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w sat|strong="G2521"\w* \w on|strong="G1909"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w worship|strong="G4352"\w* \w him|strong="G3588"\w* that \w liveth|strong="G2198"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w ever|strong="G0165"\w* and \w ever|strong="G0165"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w cast|strong="G0906"\w* \w their|strong="G0846"\w* \w crowns|strong="G4735"\w* \w before|strong="G1799"\w* the \w throne|strong="G2362"\w*, \w saying|strong="G3004"\w*,

Thou \w art|strong="G1488"\w* \w worthy|strong="G0514"\w*, O \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, to \w receive|strong="G2983"\w* \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w honour|strong="G5092"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w power|strong="G1411"\w*: \w for|strong="G3754"\w* \w thou|strong="G4771"\w* hast \w created|strong="G2936"\w* all \w things|strong="G3956"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w thy|strong="G4675"\w* \w pleasure|strong="G2307"\w* they \w are|strong="G1526"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* were \w created|strong="G2936"\w*.
